CustomField.description: This field was used prior to the implementation of project 2122.
CustomField.formula: Case(Correct_Template_Chosen_For_Case__c,0,0,1)+ Case(Demonstrates_Product_Knowledge__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Final_Email_All_Issues_Addressed__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Notes_Comments_Made_And_Actions_Taken__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Greets_Introduces_Brands__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Uses_Customers_Name__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Accurate_And_Complete_Information_Given__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Acknowledges_Displays_Understands_Issue__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(All_Customer_Info_Captured_Updated__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Uses_Professional_Lang_Tone_On_Call__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Demonstrates_Empathy_Apology_Statements__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Offers_Additional_Assistance__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(First_Day_Acknowledgement_Of_Request__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Brands_Correctly_Appreciates_Client__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Correct_Grammar_Spelling_Punctuation__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Directed_Client_To_Online_Help_Or_LS__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Hold_Procedure_Not_Exceeding_2_mins__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Issue_Not_Resolved_FCR_Next_Steps__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Advises_Customer_CaseNum_Will_Be_Emailed__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(All_Steps_Are_Taken_To_Resolve__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Avoids_Long_Pauses_Dead_Air__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Client_Satisfaction_Completed__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Confidence_In_Communication__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Adequately_Assisted_Customer__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Agent_Sends_Case_Number_Via_Email__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Focus_And_Displays_Call_Control__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Response_Addressed_Correct_Recipients__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(New_Contact_Created_If_Applicable__c ,0,0,1)+ Case(Refers_Transfer_To_Correct_Department__c ,0,0,1)
